name: facebook-events-ical-converter
description: App that converts events on Facebook event page to iCal file.

scripts.build:firebase:hosting: npm run clean:build && NODE_ENV=production NODE_APP=firebase webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:firebase:hosting:dev: npm run clean:build && NODE_ENV=development NODE_APP=firebase webpack --mode=development
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run build:dev" "NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 nodemon lib/index.js"
scripts.start:dev:inspect: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 nodemon --inspect lib/index.js
scripts.start:dev:firebase: npm run build:firebase:hosting:dev && NODE_ENV=development firebase emulators:start

author: Ondrej Synacek <ondrejsynacek@fastmail.com>
